Question: A few months before the elections, this person fired Kasyanov's cabinet and appointed Mikhail Fradkov to his place.
Hints: This person joined the KGB in 1975 upon graduation, and underwent a year's training at the 401st KGB school in Okhta, Leningrad.
This person's name and image are widely used in advertisement and product branding.
Less than one year later, this person was investigated by a commission of the city legislative council.
